name: Benzonatate
indications: BENZONATATE is indicated for the symptomatic relief of cough.
contraindications:
Adults and Children over 10 years of age: Usual dose is one 100 mg or 200 mg capsule three times a day as needed for cough. If necessary to control cough, up to 600 mg daily in three divided doses may be given.
 
  BENZONATATE should be swallowed whole.BENZONATATE Capsules are not to be broken, chewed, dissolved, cut or crushed.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Benzonatate Capsules USP, 200 mg: Yellow soft gelatin capsules, imprinted with "PA83", available in bottles of 100's (NDC 72162-1914-1)
                  The capsules should be protected from light, moisture and humidity, and stored at controlled room temperature 20째 to 25째C (68째 to 77째F) [See USP].
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in USP/NF.
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions: Hypersensitivity to benzonatate or related compounds.
